headline: CRH elects Patrick Decker to its Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, September 09, 2025--CRH (NYSE: CRH), the leading global provider of building materials, today announced the election of Mr. Patrick Decker, 60, to the CRH Board of Directors, effective Oct. 1, 2025.
